alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Washington (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 17 at 8:26PM CDT until further notice by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Alabama... Tombigbee River Near Leroy affecting Clarke and Washington Counties. For the Tombigbee River...including Coffeeville Dam, Leroy...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tombigbee River Near Leroy. * WHEN...From this evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, flooding of low lying farm and pasturelands begins. Cattle in low lying areas should be moved to higher ground. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 23.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening and continue rising to a crest of 27.5 feet early Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 24.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
